## Private Member Attributes

### Constraints {#a5a00f60f548f9a32044efcf00a161e8d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;SmallVector&lt;Entry, 8&gt;, 4&gt; llvm::ConstraintSystem::Constraints</>}>
Current linear constraints in the system.

An entry of the form c0, c1, ... cn represents the following constraint: c0 &gt;= v0 &#42; c1 + .... + v&#123;n-1&#125; &#42; cn

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/constraintsystem-h/#l00050">50</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/constraintsystem-h">ConstraintSystem.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### negateOrEqual() {#aaee87e0be7be4679dbd53c9c078ba558}

Multiplies each coefficient in the given vector by -1.

Does not modify the original vector.
